title: Mansfield Park - describes the narrative technique

content.prompt: Which statement best describes the narrative technique employed in "He was...conquest"?

choices.label: The narrator generates humor by means of hyperbole.
The narrator uses negation to convey mere adequacy.
The narrator cites a particular instance as the basis for a generalization.
The narrator underscores a point with a redundant reiteration.

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Identify and describe details, diction, or syntax in a text that reveal a narrator's or speaker's perspective.
